LanguageData.DC_Letter_LoanGranted_Text: The Ledger has granted you a loan of {0} silver. Interest of {1} silver is due in {2} days. Do not miss a payment.
LanguageData.DC_Letter_InterestDue_Text: The Ledger demands {0} silver in interest. You have until tomorrow to pay. Failure to comply will be noted.
LanguageData.DC_Letter_InterestMissed_Text: You have missed an interest payment to The Ledger. This is your {0} missed payment. After {1} missed payments, they will come to collect in full.
LanguageData.DC_Letter_PaymentMissed_Text:
You have missed your payment deadline to The Ledger. This is missed payment #{0}.

Late fees incurred: {1} silver
Additional penalty interest: +{2}% per day

Interest and fees will continue to accrue. Your debt must be paid in full before the loan term expires or The Ledger will send collectors.
LanguageData.DC_Letter_FullPaymentDemanded_Text: The Ledger demands immediate full payment of {0} silver. You have missed your payment deadline. Pay in full to avoid further consequences.
LanguageData.DC_Letter_CollectionsNotice_Text:
THE LEDGER DEMANDS FULL REPAYMENT.

You owe {0} silver. Pay by end of day or face forceful collection.

This is not a negotiation.
LanguageData.DC_Letter_CollectionsRaid_Text: You failed to pay your debts. The Ledger's collectors have arrived to take what is owed - one way or another.

LanguageData.DC_Letter_TributeSent_Text: The Ledger has accepted your tribute of {0} silver. Your borrowing privileges have been restored. Do not disappoint us again.

LanguageData.DC_Settings_MaxLoanAmount_Desc: Maximum silver that can be borrowed. Set to 0 for unlimited.

LanguageData.DC_Settings_InterestRate_Desc: Percentage of principal charged as interest each period.
LanguageData.DC_Settings_InterestRatePerDay_Desc: Interest charged per day as a percentage of principal.

LanguageData.DC_Settings_GraceMissedPayments_Desc: Number of missed payments allowed before collections is triggered.
